Is saving progress even possible? Also I want to share something:
````
[Difficulty]: {rotate difficulty:1:2:3:4:5}. [Choose difficulty]
[Choose difficulty]:
The difficulty you have chosen is {if difficulty=1:very easy}{if difficulty=2:easy}{if difficulty=3:normal}{if difficulty=4:hard}{if difficulty=5:extreme}.
````
Option in rotate leads to other text. Also works if it shows a link or something else. Code in binary:
````
00100111010001000110100101100110011001100110100101100011011101010110110001110100011110010100000010000000100000...
````
The whole thing is 17 times longer. This binary code only meant [Difficulty]:

Posts.EditableText: Squiffy auto saves after every change.
I mean player progress. Not changes.
